sqlQuery.name: PathwaysByPathwayID
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT p.source_id , '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id , pa.pathway_source FROM sres.Pathway p , apidbtuning.pathwayattributes pa , sres.externaldatabase ed , sres.externaldatabaserelease edr WHERE (p.pathway_id LIKE REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE($$metabolic_pathway_id$$,' ',''),'-', '%'),'*','%'),'any','%') OR lower(p.source_id) LIKE REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(lower($$pathway_wildcard$$),' ',''),'-', '%'),'*','%'),'any','%') OR lower(p.name) LIKE REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(lower($$pathway_wildcard$$),' ',''),'-', '%'),'*','%'),'any','%') ) AND p.pathway_id = pa.pathway_id AND pa.external_db_name = ed.name AND ed.external_database_id = edr.external_database_id AND (edr.external_database_release_id = $$pathways_source$$ OR $$pathways_source$$ = 1)

sqlQuery.name: PathwaysByIdentifierList
sqlQuery.sql: WITH ds AS (select pathway_source from ($$ds_pathway_id$$)) SELECT '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id, source_id, pathway_source, apidb.tab_to_string(set(cast(COLLECT(identifier) AS apidb.varchartab))) as identifiers, apidb.tab_to_string(set(cast(COLLECT(type) AS apidb.varchartab))) as type FROM ( -- Compounds SELECT distinct pa.source_id as source_id , pa.pathway_source , ds.pathway_source AS identifier , 'compound' as type , edr.external_database_release_id FROM apidbtuning.pathwaycompounds pc , apidbtuning.pathwayattributes pa , sres.externaldatabase ed , sres.externaldatabaserelease edr , ds WHERE (ds.pathway_source = pc.compound_source_id OR ds.pathway_source = pc.chebi_accession) AND pc.ext_db_name = ed.name AND edr.external_database_id = ed.external_database_id and pa.pathway_id = pc.pathway_id UNION -- Enzyme SELECT distinct pa.source_id as source_id , pa.pathway_source , ds.pathway_source AS identifier , 'enzyme' as type , edr.external_database_release_id FROM apidbtuning.transcriptpathway tp , apidbtuning.pathwayattributes pa , sres.externaldatabase ed , sres.externaldatabaserelease edr , ds WHERE ds.pathway_source = tp.ec_number AND pa.pathway_id = tp.pathway_id AND pa.external_db_name = ed.name and edr.external_database_id = ed.external_database_id UNION -- Gene SELECT distinct pa.source_id as source_id , pa.pathway_source , ds.pathway_source AS identifier , 'gene' as type , edr.external_database_release_id FROM apidbtuning.pathwayattributes pa , apidbtuning.transcriptpathway tp , sres.externaldatabase ed , sres.externaldatabaserelease edr , ds WHERE lower(tp.gene_source_id) = lower(ds.pathway_source) AND tp.pathway_id = pa.pathway_id AND pa.external_db_name = ed.name AND edr.external_database_id = ed.external_database_id UNION -- Reaction SELECT distinct pa.source_id as source_id , pa.pathway_source , ds.pathway_source AS identifier , 'reaction' as type , edr.external_database_release_id FROM apidbtuning.pathwaycompounds pc , apidbtuning.pathwayreactions pr , apidbtuning.pathwayattributes pa , sres.externaldatabase ed , sres.externaldatabaserelease edr , ds WHERE ds.pathway_source = pr.reaction_source_id AND pr.reaction_id = pc.reaction_id AND pc.pathway_id = pa.pathway_id AND pa.external_db_name = pr.ext_db_name AND pa.external_db_name = ed.name AND ed.external_database_id = edr.external_database_id UNION -- Pathways from direct pathwayNodes SELECT distinct pa.source_id , pa.pathway_source , ds.pathway_source AS identifier , 'pathway' as type , edr.external_database_release_id FROM apidbtuning.pathwayattributes pa , sres.externaldatabase ed , sres.externaldatabaserelease edr , ds WHERE ds.pathway_source = pa.source_id AND pa.external_db_name = ed.name AND edr.external_database_id = ed.external_database_id ) WHERE (external_database_release_id = $$pathways_source$$ OR $$pathways_source$$=1) GROUP BY source_id, pathway_source ORDER BY source_id

sqlQuery.name: PathwaysByGeneList
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id , source_id , pathway_source , count (distinct gene_source_id) as gene_count , rtrim(xmlagg(xmlelement(e, gene_source_id, ' | ').extract('//text()') order by gene_source_id).getClobVal(), ' | ') as genes , rtrim(xmlagg(xmlelement(e, ec_gene, ' | ').extract('//text()') order by gene_source_id).getClobVal(), ' | ') as ec_gene , rtrim(xmlagg(xmlelement(e, ec_pathway, ' | ').extract('//text()') order by gene_source_id).getClobVal(), ' | ') as ec_pathway FROM ( SELECT source_id , pathway_source , gene_source_id , ec_pathway , rtrim(xmlagg(xmlelement(e, ec_gene, ', ').extract('//text()') order by ec_gene), ', ') as ec_gene FROM ( SELECT source_id , pathway_source , gene_source_id , ec_gene , rtrim(xmlagg(xmlelement(e, ec_pathway, ', ').extract('//text()') order by ec_pathway), ', ') as ec_pathway FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT pa.SOURCE_ID , pa.PATHWAY_SOURCE , tp.gene_source_id , tp.EC_NUMBER as ec_gene , pr.ENZYME as ec_pathway FROM apidbtuning.pathwayattributes pa , apidbtuning.transcriptpathway tp , apidbtuning.pathwaycompounds pc , apidbtuning.pathwayreactions pr , apidbtuning.GeneId gi , SRES.EXTERNALDATABASE ed , SRES.EXTERNALDATABASERELEASE edr , ($$ds_gene_ids$$) ds WHERE lower(gi.id) = lower(ds.gene_source_id) AND tp.GENE_SOURCE_ID = gi.gene AND tp.PATHWAY_ID = pa.PATHWAY_ID AND pc.PATHWAY_ID = pa.PATHWAY_ID AND pr.REACTION_ID = pc.REACTION_ID AND pr.EXT_DB_NAME = pc.EXT_DB_NAME AND (tp.ec_number NOT LIKE '%-' OR $$exclude_incomplete_ec$$ = 0) AND ((pr.enzyme like replace (tp.ec_number, '-', '%') AND $$exact_match_only$$ = 0) OR (pr.enzyme = tp.ec_number AND $$exact_match_only$$ = 1)) AND pa.EXTERNAL_DB_NAME = ed.NAME AND edr.EXTERNAL_DATABASE_ID = ed.EXTERNAL_DATABASE_ID AND (edr.EXTERNAL_DATABASE_RELEASE_ID = $$pathways_source$$ or $$pathways_source$$ = 1) GROUP BY pa.SOURCE_ID, pa.PATHWAY_SOURCE, tp.EC_NUMBER, pr.ENZYME, tp.gene_source_id HAVING (('$$any_or_all_pathway$$' = 'any' ) OR (count(*) <= (SELECT count (*) FROM APIDBTUNING.TRANSCRIPTPATHWAY tp , apidbtuning.GeneId gi , ($$ds_gene_ids$$) ds WHERE lower(gi.id) = lower(ds.gene_source_id) AND tp.GENE_SOURCE_ID = gi.gene ))) ) GROUP BY source_id, pathway_source, gene_source_id, ec_gene order by gene_source_id ) GROUP BY source_id, pathway_source, gene_source_id, ec_pathway order by pathway_source ) GROUP BY source_id, pathway_source

sqlQuery.name: PathwaysByCompounds
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT pa.source_id , '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id , pa.pathway_source FROM apidbtuning.compoundid ci , apidbtuning.pathwaycompounds pc , apidbtuning.pathwayattributes pa , ($$ds_compound_id$$) ds , sres.externaldatabase ed , sres.externaldatabaserelease edr WHERE pc.chebi_accession = ci.compound AND pa.pathway_id = pc.pathway_id AND ci.compound = ds.source_id AND pa.external_db_name = ed.name AND edr.external_database_id = ed.external_database_id AND (edr.external_database_release_id = $$pathways_source$$ or $$pathways_source$$ = 1) GROUP BY pa.source_id, pa.pathway_source HAVING (('$$any_or_all_pathway$$' = 'any') OR (count(*) = (select count(*) FROM ($$ds_compound_id$$) ds WHERE ds.source_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT chebi_accession FROM apidbtuning.PathwayCompounds )) ))

sqlQuery.name: ByWeightFilter
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT a.source_id, a.project_id, a.pathway_source, a.wdk_weight FROM $$pathway_result$$ a WHERE a.wdk_weight >= $$min_weight$$ AND a.wdk_weight <= $$max_weight$$

sqlQuery.name: PathwaysByGeneIds
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id , source_id , pathway_source , count (distinct gene_source_id) as gene_count , rtrim(xmlagg(xmlelement(e, gene_source_id, ' | ').extract('//text()') order by gene_source_id).getClobVal(), ' | ') as genes , rtrim(xmlagg(xmlelement(e, ec_gene, ' | ').extract('//text()') order by gene_source_id).getClobVal(), ' | ') as ec_gene , rtrim(xmlagg(xmlelement(e, ec_pathway, ' | ').extract('//text()') order by gene_source_id).getClobVal(), ' | ') as ec_pathway , ecNums , max(wdk_weight) as wdk_weight FROM ( SELECT source_id , pathway_source , gene_source_id , ec_pathway , rtrim(xmlagg(xmlelement(e, ec_gene, ', ').extract('//text()') order by ec_gene), ', ') as ec_gene , ecNums , wdk_weight FROM ( SELECT source_id , pathway_source , gene_source_id , ec_gene , rtrim(xmlagg(xmlelement(e, ec_pathway, ', ').extract('//text()') order by ec_pathway), ', ') as ec_pathway , ecNums , wdk_weight FROM ( with ecNums as ( SELECT DISTINCT tp.pathway_id , apidb.tab_to_string(set(cast(COLLECT(pr.ENZYME) AS apidb.varchartab))) as ecNums FROM apidbtuning.transcriptpathway tp , apidbtuning.pathwaycompounds pc , apidbtuning.pathwayreactions pr , sres.externaldatabase ed , sres.externaldatabaserelease edr , ($$gene_result$$) ds WHERE tp.GENE_SOURCE_ID = ds.gene_source_id AND (tp.ec_number NOT LIKE '%-' OR $$exclude_incomplete_ec$$ = 0) AND ((pr.enzyme like replace (tp.ec_number, '-', '%') AND $$exact_match_only$$ = 0) OR (pr.enzyme = tp.ec_number AND $$exact_match_only$$ = 1)) AND pr.REACTION_ID = pc.REACTION_ID AND pr.EXT_DB_NAME = pc.EXT_DB_NAME AND pc.EXT_DB_NAME = ed.NAME AND edr.EXTERNAL_DATABASE_ID = ed.EXTERNAL_DATABASE_ID and tp.pathway_id = pc.pathway_id AND (edr.EXTERNAL_DATABASE_RELEASE_ID = $$pathways_source$$ or $$pathways_source$$ = 1) GROUP BY tp.pathway_id HAVING '$$any_or_all_pathway$$' = 'any' or count(*) = (select count(*) from apidbtuning.transcriptpathway tp, ($$gene_result$$) ds where lower(tp.gene_source_id) = lower(ds.gene_source_id)) ) SELECT DISTINCT tp.pathway_source_id as source_id , tp.pathway_source , tp.gene_source_id , tp.EC_NUMBER as ec_gene , pr.ENZYME as ec_pathway , e.ecNums as ecNums , ds.wdk_weight FROM apidbtuning.transcriptpathway tp , apidbtuning.pathwaycompounds pc , apidbtuning.pathwayreactions pr , SRES.EXTERNALDATABASE ed , SRES.EXTERNALDATABASERELEASE edr , ecNums e , ($$gene_result$$) ds WHERE ds.gene_source_id = tp.gene_source_id AND pc.pathway_id = tp.pathway_id AND pr.REACTION_ID = pc.REACTION_ID AND pr.EXT_DB_NAME = pc.EXT_DB_NAME AND (tp.ec_number NOT LIKE '%-' OR $$exclude_incomplete_ec$$ = 0) AND ((pr.enzyme like replace (tp.ec_number, '-', '%') AND $$exact_match_only$$ = 0) OR (pr.enzyme = tp.ec_number AND $$exact_match_only$$ = 1)) AND pc.ext_db_name = ed.name AND edr.EXTERNAL_DATABASE_ID = ed.EXTERNAL_DATABASE_ID AND (edr.EXTERNAL_DATABASE_RELEASE_ID = $$pathways_source$$ or $$pathways_source$$ = 1) and e.pathway_id = tp.pathway_id GROUP BY tp.pathway_source_id, tp.pathway_source, tp.gene_source_id, tp.ec_number, pr.enzyme, e.ecNums, ds.wdk_weight HAVING (('$$any_or_all_pathway$$' = 'any' ) OR (count(*) <= (SELECT count (*) FROM APIDBTUNING.TRANSCRIPTPATHWAY tp , ($$gene_result$$) ds WHERE ds.gene_source_id = tp.gene_source_id ))) ) GROUP BY source_id, pathway_source, gene_source_id, ec_gene, wdk_weight, ecNums order by gene_source_id ) GROUP BY source_id, pathway_source, gene_source_id, ec_pathway, wdk_weight, ecNums order by pathway_source ) GROUP BY source_id, pathway_source, ecNums

sqlQuery.name: PathwaysByCompoundIds
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT pa.SOURCE_ID , pa.PATHWAY_SOURCE , '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id , count(distinct ds.source_id) as compound_count , apidb.tab_to_string(set(cast(COLLECT(pc.chebi_accession) AS apidb.varchartab))) as compounds , max(ds.wdk_weight) as wdk_weight FROM ($$compound_result$$) ds , apidbtuning.pathwayattributes pa , ApiDBTuning.PathwayCompounds pc , sres.externaldatabase ed , sres.externaldatabaserelease edr WHERE pc.chebi_accession = ds.source_id AND pa.PATHWAY_ID = pc.PATHWAY_ID AND pa.EXTERNAL_DB_NAME = ed.NAME AND edr.external_database_id = ed.external_database_id AND (edr.EXTERNAL_DATABASE_RELEASE_ID = $$pathways_source$$ or $$pathways_source$$ = 1) GROUP BY pa.SOURCE_ID, pa.PATHWAY_SOURCE HAVING '$$any_or_all_pathway$$' = 'any' or count(*) = (select count(*) from apidbtuning.PathwayCompounds pc, ($$compound_result$$) ds where lower(pc.chebi_accession) = lower(ds.source_id))
